description:
Classic Blundstone comfort in a heeled boot. These boots merge classic Blundstone comfort with timeless Chelsea boot styling, with a sleeker, more feminine toe.

  • Weatherproof, full-grain leather upper is seamlessly fused to sole to provide resilient construction
  • Leather-lined for durability and comfort
  • Polyurethane midsole provides cushioning
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Removable XRD™ footbed adds extra cushioning and impact absorption
  • Block heel
  • Polyurethane outsole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Women's Series Heel 1677 Boots - Women's
